text: MSCs harvest and culture After dynamic MRI measurement at week 2, the bone marrow was harvested from proximal femur for MSCs culture based on our established protocol [12] . MSCs were cultured in basal medium containing Dulbecco's modified Eagle's medium (DMEM) with 10% fetal bovine serum, 1% mixture of penicillin, streptomycin and neomycin (Invitrogen Corporation, Carlsbad, USA). The cells were cultured in an incubator at 37Â°C, 5% humidified CO 2 for two weeks. Then the cells were harvested for the following evaluations:
